definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The value and developing countermeasure of Shandong Dough Statue.
sentences.chinese: 山东民间面塑的价值及发展对策研究。

sentences.english: This set of dough modeling creatures is delicate, and vivid.
sentences.chinese: 这套面塑人物真是做工精巧，栩栩如生。

sentences.english: Dough Figurines are Chinese traditional art form and is commonly known as sticky rice flour toys.
sentences.chinese: 面塑是中国的一种民间工艺，俗称面人或者江米人。

sentences.english: Having worked on dough figurines for years, I have a deep passion for them.
sentences.chinese: 我曾从事面塑工作多年，深深地热爱这门艺术。

sentences.english: Besides, the guests can enjoy the live show of dough making by folk artists in hall.
sentences.chinese: 大厅还有民间面塑艺术家的现场面塑制作。

sentences.english: Besides, the guests can enjoy the live show of dough making by folk artists in hall.
sentences.chinese: 大厅还有民间面塑艺术家的现场面塑制作。

definition: papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
woven palm fiber (used in handicraft)/coir/woven coconut fiber
